org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.impl

Class ApplicationFrameworkLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.impl.ApplicationFrameworkLayer

  • public class ApplicationFrameworkLayer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a singelton aimed at share the the Application Framework Layer
    status of the ZigBee Base Drier among all the ZigBeeEndpoint register by it.

    In particular, this class tracks the Transaction Id and the Active End Point
    on the hardware providing access to ZigBee Network (currently the Texas Instrument CC2480)
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision: 799 $ ($LastChangedDate: 2013-08-06 19:00:05 +0300 (Tue, 06 Aug 2013) $)
    Author:
    Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi, Francesco Furfari
